name: TetraClimber
description:
TetraClimber was made for the 2021 Epic Mega Jam with the theme "Running Out of Space." The game uses that term in three ways, you are running out of space because Tetris-like blocks falling around you. You also have limited jumps and need to collect space bars. The game is also set in space. You have to avoid the debris of your ship after a crash, causing it to merge with a rare mineral called "pixelstone" that your ship was transporting.

WASD to move, Space to jump, and Mouse to look around.  The goal of the game is to get as high as you can. You start with only 5 jumps. Collect green space bars to get more jumps!

Music and audio provided by Zapsplat, font provided by 1001 free fonts.
